titles.title: CB 201 Unto Him be glory in the church

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Unto Him be glory in the church
both now and evermore
Unto Him be glory in the church
both now and evermore

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Unto Him, unto Him, unto Him, unto Him
Unto Him be glory in the Church
Both now and evermore
